info.descko: 엄마의 생일선물을 고민하는 남자친구를 위해 여자친구가 제안한 방법은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: You look so serious, Peter. What's up?
sentense.ko: 피터 너무 심각하게 보여. 무슨 일이 있니?

sentense.en: Well, Laura, tomorrow is my mom's birthday. I am thinking about what to buy for her.
sentense.en_: Well, Laura, tomorrow __ __ ___'_ ________. I am thinking about ____ __ ___ ___ ___.
sentense.ko: 그래, 로라, 내일이 어머니 생신이야. 그녀에게 무엇을 사줄까 생각중이야.

sentense.en: I already gave her one last year.
My dad is probably going to give her a bag.
sentense.en_: My dad is ________ _____ __ give her a bag.

sentense.en: And my sister is planning to buy either a polka dot skirt or a blouse.
sentense.en_: And my sister is _______ __ ___ ______ a polka dot skirt or a blouse.
sentense.ko: 그리고 나의 여동생은 폴카 점이 있는 스커트나 블라우스를 살 계획을 하고 있을 꺼야.
words: A 와 B 둘 중 하나
A 와 B 둘 다 아닌

sentense.en: I want to give my mom something special this year.
sentense.en_: I want to give my mom _________ _______ this year.
sentense.ko: 나는 금년에는 좀 특별한 것을 어머니에게 드리고 싶어.

sentense.en: Hmm, how about baking a birthday cake for her?
sentense.ko: 음, 생일 케이크를 굽는 것은 어때?

sentense.en: Oh, that's a good idea. But I don't know how and I don't have enough time.
sentense.en_: Oh, that's a good idea. But I don't know how and I ___'_ ____ ______ ____.
sentense.ko: 오, 좋은 생각이야, 그렇지만 어떻게 굽는줄도 모르고 시간도 충분치 않아.

sentense.en: I'll help you. Let's get started.
Thanks. You are such a great friend.
